commit message:
Only include name with an address if it's non-empty.

(cherry picked from commit 5fa757bba1a2df6e92a922e0fce3bd63817a9a38)

Should not use double-quoted empty string.
Some host may reject such the From address.
(cherry picked from commit 68381d472598951c6e3804af2cb604a5e4616bb9)

Author: unknown <Kris@.(none)>
Date:   Sat Feb 12 16:10:12 2011 -0500

Correctly verify when the user is authenticated or not. Handle
'quasi-absolute' form targets during au
thentication.
Fix bug with partitioning of IMAP FETCH commands

Corrected spanish translation with information provided by hayawata.

Fixes issue 3052

Use SslCertificate that is part of the official Android API instead of
BouncyCastle's X509Name (which is not shipped anymore in Android 3.0)
to verify domain names on SSL/TLS connections.
